Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.adobe.acs.commons.util.BufferingResponse
    Rather use BufferedHttpServletResponse
    com.adobe.acs.commons.util.StringWriterResponse
    Rather use BufferedSlingHttpServletResponse instead
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.adobe.acs.commons.workflow.bulk.removal.WorkflowInstanceRemover.WORKFLOW_INSTANCES_PATH
    please use the multi-value WORKFLOW_INSTANCES_PATHS instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.adobe.acs.commons.httpcache.engine.CacheContent.build(HttpCacheServletResponseWrapper)
    Use build(HttpCacheServletResponseWrapper responseWrapper,int status, String charEncoding, String contentType, Map> headers) throws HttpCacheDataStreamException
    com.adobe.acs.commons.xss.XSSFunctions.encodeForHTML(XSSAPI, String)
    replaced by XSSFunctions.encodeForHTML(XSSAPI, String) Encode a string for HTML.
    com.adobe.acs.commons.xss.XSSFunctions.encodeForHTMLAttr(XSSAPI, String)
    replaced by XSSFunctions.encodeForHTMLAttr(XSSAPI, String) Encode a string for an HTML attribute.
    com.adobe.acs.commons.xss.XSSFunctions.encodeForJSString(XSSAPI, String)
    replaced by XSSFunctions.encodeForJSString(XSSAPI, String) Encode a string for an JavaScript string.
    com.adobe.acs.commons.xss.XSSFunctions.filterHTML(XSSAPI, String)
    replaced by XSSFunctions.filterHTML(XSSAPI, String) Filter a string for HTML.
    com.adobe.acs.commons.mcp.form.FieldComponent.getField()
    Use getAccessibleObject and AccessibleObjectUtils to handle both Method (getter) or Fields
    com.adobe.acs.commons.xss.XSSFunctions.getValidDimension(XSSAPI, String, String)
    replaced by XSSFunctions.getValidDimension(XSSAPI, String, String) Validate a string which should contain a dimension, returning a default value if the source is empty, can't be parsed, or contains XSS risks. Allows integer dimensions and the keyword "auto".
    com.adobe.acs.commons.xss.XSSFunctions.getValidHref(XSSAPI, String)
    replaced by XSSFunctions.getValidHref(XSSAPI, String) Get a valid href. This does not use the standard XSS API due to a bug impacting CQ 5.6.1 (and earlier). Internal bug reference: GRANITE-4193
    com.adobe.acs.commons.xss.XSSFunctions.getValidInteger(XSSAPI, String, int)
    replaced by XSSFunctions.getValidInteger(XSSAPI, String, int) Validate a string which should contain an integer, returning a default value if the source is empty, can't be parsed, or contains XSS risks.
    com.adobe.acs.commons.xss.XSSFunctions.getValidJSToken(XSSAPI, String, String)
    replaced by XSSFunctions.getValidJSToken(XSSAPI, String, String) Validate a Javascript token. The value must be either a single identifier, a literal number, or a literal string.
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements 
    Annotation Type Element and Description
    com.adobe.acs.commons.models.injectors.annotation.ChildResourceFromRequest.optional
